function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Spread of infectious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Proper segregation, handling, and disposal of infectious and pathological wastes","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies such as pyrolysis, vaporization, incineration, and plasma incineration","People":"Hospital staff, maintenance workers, and waste disposal personnel","Owner":"Hospital management and building maintenance authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","Impact":"Potential exposure to hazardous materials and toxic substances","Mitigation":"Implementation of high-efficiency disinfection technologies with strict adherence to safety protocols","Technologies":"Pyrolysis, vaporization, incineration, and plasma incineration","People":"Hospital staff and maintenance workers","Owner":"Hospital management and building maintenance authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of proper training and expertise in handling advanced disinfection technologies","Impact":"Increased risk of incomplete disinfection and generation of harmful by-products","Mitigation":"Investment in training and technical personnel, and strict adherence to operational guidelines","Technologies":"Pyrolysis, vaporization, incineration, and plasma incineration","People":"Technical personnel and maintenance workers","Owner":"Hospital management and building maintenance authorities"}]}
